# Network Connection Checker Web App

This project is a web application that monitors network connectivity by pinging internet addresses every second for an hour, displaying real-time graphs and connection break information.

## Project Structure
- HTML file with the main application interface
- CSS for styling the graph and table components
- JavaScript for network monitoring, Chart.js visualization, and break tracking
- Uses Chart.js for real-time graph visualization

## Key Features
- Pings internet addresses every second for one hour
- Real-time graph showing connection trends and breaks
- Table displaying connection break details (start time, end time, duration)
- Visual indicators for connection status

## Development Guidelines
- Keep the interface clean and responsive
- Ensure real-time updates work smoothly
- Handle connection failures gracefully
- Use modern web standards and best practices
